name: Melon Smasher V1.2: Beyond the Limit
name_original: Melon Smasher V1.2: Beyond the Limit
description:
Melon Smasher v1.2: Beyond the Limit Want to smash some melons?

Don't turn the audio too loud before start the game!

Play this game by any key.

Classic version: https://jefferyxue.itch.io/melon-smasher-dont-murder-square-cat.

New Feature in V1.2
  • Advanced Combo System: Smashing double, triple, or more melons in one mash will active a bonus buff. During the buff single smash will count as two(x2) or more combos. A miss of melon during the buff will not end combo but end the buff.
  • Level Switch: After filling up the melon juice container, the game will switch to another level. Every level have their unique features, melons & cats. Currently there are two levels: normal factory & blackout factory. There will be more levels in the future.
  • Power Out: In power out level, the main light source of the factory is broken. The scene becomes very dark and there are only few light source light. Player can smash on the ground to lit up the light for a second. There are also glowing melons and glowing cats. Smashing the glowing melons will creating some light source.
  • Universal Render Pipeline & 2D Light: This game is using universal render pipeline now and this update implements many light sources.
  • Melons Waves: For every 150 combos you get, there will be a wave of melons and your smasher is replaced by an electric saw. Just Enjoy!
  • Other: Some changes on graphic. Some changes on colliders for optimization.
